scripts.build: NEXT_PUBLIC_BASE_PATH=/tecnam_p2002jf_performances npm run prebuild && NEXT_PUBLIC_BASE_PATH=/tecnam_p2002jf_performances npx next build
scripts.build:ios: NEXT_PUBLIC_BASE_PATH= npm run prebuild && npx next build
scripts.ios:build: npm run build:ios && npx cap sync ios && node scripts/setup-ios-splash.js
scripts.ios:sync: npx cap sync ios && node scripts/setup-ios-splash.js
